lines.text: You stupid, ignorant son of a bitch, dumb bastard. Jesus Christ. I've met some dumb bastards in my time but you outdo them all.
[repeated line]

[each time he jumps, falls, is thrown or is pushed off the train]
Son of a bitch!
I've never milked a cow before.
Cut the gas, Steve, you're a grown man. I'm sure you've had some similar experience.
[George is pretending to be a black man in order to evade the police]
I don't think we're going to make it past the cops.
We'll make it past the cops. I just hope we don't see no Muslims.
What do you think?
I think you better make a right up here and then a sharp left. I'm coming over.
[climbs over the seat. George suddenly swerves the car, causing Grover to lunge forward]
Jesus Christ, man, is that how you murdered your victims? Put them in a car and bounced them to death?
Sorry.
Sorry, my ass. You dangerous... Proves one thing though, you don't do this for no living.
No I don't.
[Grover had just rammed several police cars with the one they had stolen]
Hello, Car 36, what the hell happened to you guys?

[into the radio]
Hey Chauncey, this is Grover T. Muldoon. You wanna know what happened? We just whooped your ass. We whooped your ass. Ha ha ha!

[In the midst of battle, a table collapsed on Grover]
Are you alright?

[immediately recovers]
Is it over?

[lets table drop on him]
Shit.
I did not Kill Sweet.
We Know that, but if you weren't so dumb you could've realized that we planted that news story for your own protection.
They talk of the joy of sex but it doesn't last like the fun of flying.
Who you lookin' for?

[shows Grover a picture of George]
White guy.
Well if I see any I'll let you know.
I know what goes where, and why.
I've received a report from the signal towers they see no engineer in the cab.
Great, now you got the facts; why don't you just throw one of the switches and have the train run off on a siding.
That's the problem; all the tracks are computer programed. Switching the Silver Streak would only cause a collision with another train.
Then what the hell are you going to do? There're people riding on that train!
Oh God... You see the standard procedure in such a case would be to derail the train.
Derail it, in the middle of a yard?
Yes, actully I can't take that responsibility; I better get my boss.
You better do something you idiot, because in ten minutes; you're going to have 200 tons of locomotive smashing into Central Station on it's way to Marshall Fields!
So this is Mr. Big.
That's the man.
You ain't saying shit now, Mr. Big.

I must admit that I'm slightly at a loss for words. But on the other hand, I should warn you that you are a killer and you are wanted by the police in every state and I recommend that you, uh... be careful.

[Grover has hot wired a Jaguar; the night watchman approaches from behind, shotgun poised]
Hold it right there, nigger.
Hey, how you doing, old dude, what's happenin'?

[Gestures with gun]
Step away from the car.
Oh, I was listening to the engine. 'Sounds real good, man. Does it come with white walls?
Just move!
All right, I'm gonna move. You just take it easy, lower that rifle.
I said mo -
[George tackles him]
A pussy, huh? A PUSSY? Can we go now?
Is he with the feds?
Who?
This guy Rembrandt.
Rembrandt is dead.
Dead? That makes four. Listen, fella, are you sure you're not making this up as you go along? I'm an officer of the law and I got a lot better things to do than listen to that kind of funnin'.
[buzzer sounds]
That's my hotline. Now you take your time to get your facts straight 'cause when I come back I want your answers clear and to the point. Got that? And you can start with who shot Rembrandt!
I can't pass for black.
Who you tellin'?I didn't say I was gonna make you black. I said I was gonna get you on the train. Now we got to make them cops think you're black.
[rubs shoe polish on George's face]
It'll never work. Never.
What, you afraid it won't come off?
How come you whities got such a tight ass, man?
Damn Hippies.
[George drinks over his loss of Hilly, and tells Bob]
Did you know... that the Brainard Tunnel is the highest point on this line?
Yeah, yeah. I knew that.
Did you know that when we reach it I intend to be higher?
[During a gunfight, George Caldwell's gun runs out of bullets]
What do you think this is, a western?

[startled to see George Caldwell back on the train]
Oh, my God, it's the killer!
No, he's okay, really.

[Grover has just told George they have to jump from the train]
No! I've left this train twice already!

[looking at the wrecked locomotive]
Kind of looks like it's grinning.
I give great phone.
I don't know about you, but next time I'm going to take the bus.
You're very beautiful, Hilly.
I like you too, George.
What were you doing back there? Getting a little ass?
No, i was squeezing tits!
[Grover is attempting to hot wire a Jaguar]
I'm following the plan. Just changed my mind.
Are you crazy? I thought we were gonna take the Chevy in back.
Chevy? That's a jerk-off, man. This here is pure pussy.
Pure pussy? Tell that to the judge.
Don't worry about no judge, Man, this thing gonna get us to Kansas City on time.
How about jail? Did you know that the office is right in front of us?
What do they want you for?
Murder.
Drop me off anywhere along here okay? I don't mess with the Big M.
I can't take that responsibility. I better get my boss.
You better do something, you idiot, because in ten minutes you're going to have two hundred tons of locomotive smashing through Central Station on its way to Marshall Field's.
Here's a vitamin sample for you. Vitamin E. Now that is great for the old pecker. Yeah it really keeps a pencil sharpened.

[laughing]
Man I thought you were an amateur, but you a real pro.
Hey. He's not dead.

[Running from Helicopter to van]
How's it going?
They don't believe us!
Look the Engineer is probably anxious to bring the train in on Schedule.

[Gets on radio]
This is Chief Donaldson. Who's this?
This is Jerry Jarvis, I'm the assistant controller.
Assistant... get me your boss.
Uh he's out to lunch, but I'm sure I can handle any problem you might have.
It's not my problem, you've got a dead engineer and a runaway train that's going to hit Chicago in 15 Minutes. Now what are you going to do about it?
All right, I'll check with the signal towers. But um, you see that's impossible, if the engineer is dead, who's driving the train?
What did you come back here for?
You forgot your wallet.
Oh, some thief you are.

[to George Caldwell]
Take it easy, killer. Stay loose.
[a cop is about to give Grover Muldoon a ride]
Where would you like to go, fella?
Well - I left my Jag in Kansas City.

[climbs into the sheriff's car while pointing a gun]
Keep those hands up! Keep'em up!
Uncle Oliver, he's taking your car.
[George speeds away]
You ain't never gonna get away with... You ain't never...!
Uncle Oliver. Uncle Oliver, he's got your car...
Moose! One more word out of you and I'm gonna smash your mouth.
We'll take care of Mr. Caldwell when the time comes, but in the meantime, we're going to take EXTREMELY good care of you.
Keep your foot ON THE PEDAL!
I always lose my memory when I fall in love.
Silver Streak is a runaway. What do we do?
Jeez, it'll be here in four minutes!
Hello Chicago! Hello!
What're you slowin' down for?
There's a truck up ahead.
So, there's a truck up ahead. What you waitin' for, you the man, turn on the siren, get them hippies off the road!
Ah. Enough of this talk of plots and scenarios. Uh, join me in a cup of coffee, would you?
You like my new shoes?
Yes I do. Why don't you take them off?
Sir, do you think you'll be needing all these bags? If not, I can store some of them down towards the end.

[has brought 3 bags and an attache]
Sure, sure, all I need is this one and that one. You can take this one, and I'll keep the brief case.
If there's ever anything that you need... don't call me.

[driving away in a stolen car]
Take it easy, killer. Stay loose.
What's he doing?
He's crazy.
Crazy? He's got the right idea. Let's get out of here and go to a park.
A park?
Yeah, I wanna lie back on the grass and have you teach me some more about gardening.
[they kiss]
Is there any way to get to the engine from here?
There's no way to get to the engine at all. How come we're going so fast?
There's nobody driving the train.
Oh, that's impossible. The train would stop.
Does it look like it is stopping to you?

[looks out the window]
Sure in the hell don't. I'm gonna pull the emergency brake.
The emergency brakes have been cut.

[pauses]
Damn hippies!
Get out of here you ignorant nigger!

[Pulls gun out at points it at Devereau]
Who you calling nigger, huh? You don't know me well enough to call me nigger! I'll whoop your ass, beat the white offa your ass!
Who ARE you?
I'm a thief!
